pageContext.Name: Mehndi Green Lehenga 10-12 (bust 40")
pageContext.Description:
Mehndi Green Lehenga

Fully embroidered blouse front with real mirror, stone, cutdana and threadwork.

Plain green back blouse with gold tassels.

Bandhani print lehenga with sequin detailing all over.

Can-can, side zip, hook & ties.

Attachable plain green sleeves.

Net dupatta with gold borders.

Bust size 40 (UK 10-12).

To get the most accurate fit, it is best to measure your bust size in inches (all around at the fullest section). This piece comes with cups inside the blouse.

There is margin of 1 inch to open the bust area by your tailor.

For any questions about measurements please see our size chart

https://www.shernilondon.com/sizeguide
